dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It’s cold snowy, and the Minions are homeless. One Minion trips over a rock--except it’s not a rock, it’s another MINION buried in the snow. He helps him out. Several Minions fight over a MAP. Dave grabs it and points into the distance.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE THE MINION
dialogues.text: Se para! Avanti! They realize that the mound they are standing on is actua a POLAR BEAR. The Minions RUN AWAY, with the Bear chasing after them. T make it to a LAKE, where they JUMP onto a sheet of ICE. T begin to float away, but then realize that there are seve other BEARS at the other end of the lake. INT: SCARLET’S LAIR - HERB’S LAB - LATER 40 The Minions walk into Herb’s lab, a very hip swinger’s pa They are drawn to A LARGE CONTRAPTION in the corner. Herb is overhead, watching them.

dialogues.speaker: HERB OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Noooo-hoooo, no! Don’t get too close, boys. When it’s completed it’ll be my ultimate weapon, but right now it’s leaking radiation like you would not believe. Herb TOSSES away his cup of coffee. HERB OVERKILL (CONT’D) So... you’re here for gear! He uses an extend-o arm to lower himself from the platfor

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: Whoa.  MINIONS BL Draft 44.

dialogues.speaker: HERB OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Bob. Robert. Bobby. My boy.

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: Si?

dialogues.speaker: HERB OVERKILL
dialogues.text: You GET my FAR-OUT STRETCH-SUIT.

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: Whoooa!

dialogues.speaker: HERB OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Kevin. Kev-bo. Seventh Kevin. YOU are the proud owner of my LAVA

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Ah? Herb fills a gun with ORANGE LAVA.

dialogues.speaker: HERB OVERKILL
dialogues.text: This baby shoots ACTUAL LAVA. Kevin's EYES WIDEN. This is cool. HERB OVERKILL (CONT’D) Pretty cool, right? And finally, Stu. Stu-art. Stu-perman. Beef Stu. I got you the coolest invention, probably ever. Stuart rubs his hands together with excitement.

dialogues.speaker: STUART
dialogues.text: Ah, patel... Herb hands Stuart the HYPNO-HAT, an orb-shaped helmet.

dialogues.speaker: ...HYPNO-HAT.
dialogues.text: The helmet expands on Stuart’s head and begins to HYPNOTI Kevin and Bob. Bob begins to CLUCK like a chicken. He tur toward Herb, who promptly turns off the helmet. HERB OVERKILL (CONT’D) You can use it to hypnotize anyone.

dialogues.speaker: ANYONE
dialogues.text: Scarlet enters the room.  MINIONS BL Draft 45.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Oh! You look SO great. I feel like a proud mama, with three dashing, evil sons. Bob is having trouble with his extend-o arms.

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: Uh, Scarlet---

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: No no, don’t say anything. I won’t understand. (sighs) It’s getting late. You’ve had a BIG day, you must be exhausted!

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: Bob excitedly bounces up and down on the bed.

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: Booooing! Booooooing!

dialogues.speaker: HERB OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Wow! These cats are PUMPED!

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Well, maybe I'll settle them down with a bedtime story. Stuart tries to take a LARGE AXE down from the wall. FALLS over, barely missing Kevin with the axe. Kevin scratches himself, not noticing the axe behind him.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: How does that sound, Bob? Bob. Bob! BOB! He finally stops bouncing.

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: Bedtime porry?

dialogues.speaker: HERB OVERKILL
dialogues.text: That is a GROOVY IDEA! I'll go get some cookies and warm milk. This is gonna be SOOOO FUNNNNN! 41 He She turns. The Minions are already tucked in and ready.

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: Et la bedtime porry?  42 MINIONS BL Draft 46. She sits down at the end of the bed.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Oh, yes. I’ve got a really, really good bedtime porry. She begins.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Once upon a time... Bob leans in, excited, as we DISSOLVE TO: EXT: BIG COLORFUL WORLD - BOB’S HEAD - DAY 42 Pretty pink countryside. Rainbow in the sky. We see the THREE PIGS coming our way.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: ...there were THREE LITTLE PIGS! REVEAL: THREE PIGS, who look an awful lot like our three Minions. The Pigs walk up to a SCARLET WOLF. A female wolf that is clearly Scarlet, who LOOMS OVER THEM, THREATENINGLY!

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: One fateful day, the pigs encountered a big, bad wolf... Scarlet Wolf suddenly is all smiles, very friendly!

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: .+-who had a wonderful surprise for them! Scarlet Wolf walks the piggies home. We see Over Kevin- Piggy’s head is a THOUGHT BALLOON of ALL HIS MINION PIGGY TRIBE hanging out in the snow.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: The wolf offered the three piggies and all their friends a job working for her. They head into her castle.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Everyone would be so happy! Scarlet Wolf shows them crayon-drawn BATTLE PLANS.  MINIONS BL Draft 47.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: All the three little piggies had to do was just steal ONE LITTLE CROWN that the beautiful wolf had wanted ever since she was a penniless little street cub. Unloved and abandoned. But that crown would mean she was a princess and everybody loves a princess, so the wolf sent the piggies to get that crown. The Minion Pigs sneak on their tiptoes into THE TOWER OF LONDON.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: But the little pigs weren’t up to the challenge! They failed their mission! They are KICKED OUT by the Guards. BACK AT CASTLE SCARLET. The Pigs come back empty-handed.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: So the wolf HUFFED and PUFFED... She pulls a string. ANVILS FALL ON THE PIGS, KILLING THEM Followed by a bathtub. And then a spaceship. And then a stockpile of bombs. It EXPLODES.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: ...and she BLEW THEM OFF THE FACE OF THE EARTH. Kevin and Stuart hold each other, horrified. Bob is happy End of story.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: The end. Kevin and Stuart are FREAKED OUT.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Good luck getting that crown tomorrow, little piggies! I know you won’t disappoint me. Herb stands in the doorway, eating a cookie and drinking milk. They walk out of the room together. Kevin and Stuar don’t know what to make of that story. They look at each other, terrified. WHAT HAVE THEY GOTTEN THEMSELVES INTO?!  43 MINIONS BL Draft 48. Bob is already fast asleep.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: CHYRON TEXT: Tower of London - London A double-decker bus stops in front of the Tower of London Kevin UNROLLS what looks to be PARCHMENT. It is the rippe from THE PAINTING OF THE QUEEN in Scarlet’s throne room.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: La crowna para Scarlet! As they approach the TICKET COUNTER, Kevin turns to them.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Lemme do ay. (to Vender) Tres please.

dialogues.speaker: TICKET VENDOR
dialogues.text: You’re not allowed in without an adult. Scram, hooligans! Kevin leads Stuart and Bob away...but then gets an idea. TIME LAPSE: The Minions, stacked on top of each other and dressed like a woman, stumble up to the ticket counter. B FLIRTS with a Frenchman on the way. Kevin looks at the Frenchman through his goggles, which are hidden in the woman’s “chest.” The Frenchman is startled, but yet, stil intrigued by the woman. TICKET VENDOR (CONT’D) How many tickets, please?

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: Uhh...three please-- But then Kevin corrects him, making it sound as though th “Woman”’s stomach is talking.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Uno, please. Uno. Kevin then sets a GOLD BAR from Scarlet’s treasure room o the counter as payment. Bob giggles sheepishly. The Ticke Vendor doesn’t bat an eye and hands him a ticket.

dialogues.speaker: TICKET VENDOR
dialogues.text: Enjoy yourself, Love.  44 MINIONS BL Draft 49.

dialogues.speaker: MINIONS
dialogues.text: Thank you! The Minions enter the Tower of London and proceed to expl looking at their map and keeping an eye on the GUARDS. Th get to a room marked “KEEP OUT” and sneak in.

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: They take off their Woman costume and strap on their over and Herb’s gear.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Okay, comme me. The Minions run over to the Crown Jewels room, but a grou BEEFEATERS approaches.

dialogues.speaker: BEEFEATER 1
dialogues.text: Hey! WHAT are you doing here?

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Uuuh...pasteka?

dialogues.speaker: BEEFEATER 2
dialogues.text: This is a restricted area! Hands in the air! Stuart pushes Kevin out of the way.

dialogues.speaker: STUART
dialogues.text: Lemme do ay. He presses the button on his Hypno-Helmet and walks towar the Beefeaters, singing the opening bars to the song “HAI

dialogues.speaker: BEEFEATER 1
dialogues.text: Stop there! He hypnotizes the Beefeaters...they fight it at first...

dialogues.speaker: BEEFEATER 1, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Get back...! ..-and they begin to SING and DANCE AROUND to the song. T begin to throw off their clothes and remove their hats, w REVEAL LONG, FLOWING heads of HAIR. Kevin finally pulls Stuart and Bob away and they flee up stairs. The stairway is long and difficult to climb, but after a while, they finally reach the top.  45 46 MINIONS BL Draft 50.

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: Before them, a GIANT STEEL DOOR. Kevin takes out the LAVA LAMP-GUN. He aims it at the door gently SQUEEZES the trigger, and the LAVA LAMP-GUN FIRES, MELTING A HOLE THROUGH THE DOOR.

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: At the end of the room, kept on a big platform under glas THE QUEEN’S CROWN!

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Topilano la Crowna! Comme! They head for the crown. From out of the shadows hobbles THE KEEPER OF THE CROWN. old, feeble man in a ragged beefeater uniform.

dialogues.speaker: KEEPER OF THE CROWN, (OFF-SCREEN)
dialogues.text: So... you came for The Queen’s crown, did you? Well, you’re gonna have to get through ME! The Keeper of the Crown. Reveal, he is actually pointing in the wrong direction. The Minions LAUGH. The Keeper realizes where they are and SMACKS Kevin with his cane.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Ow! HEY!

dialogues.speaker: KEEPER OF THE CROWN
dialogues.text: You think it’s FUNNY to mock the elderly, do ya?

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Uhhh...si? WHAM! He SMACKS Kevin again and again with his cane, pummeling him.

dialogues.speaker: KEEPER OF THE CROWN
dialogues.text: I’ve been up here for decades, just waitin’ for someone to try and steal the Queen’s treasure!

dialogues.speaker: STUART
dialogues.text: Okay...me le do ay.  47 MINIONS BL Draft 51. Stuart then attempts to hypnotize the Keeper of the Crown

dialogues.speaker: KEEPER OF THE CROWN
dialogues.text: What are you saying? Never mind, don’t care. He kicks Stuart out of the way. The display case then begins to lower through the floor. Kevin points to it.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Oh no! Kevin grabs the lava gun from the floor and points it at It lights up...

dialogues.speaker: KEEPER OF THE CROWN
dialogues.text: Oh no you don’t! Oh, flippin’ heck... He presses his rapier against the barrel of the gun, but gun jams up, TOSSING him against the wall and SPLATTERING lava all over the room. A FACE MASK from one of the room’ suits of armor lands on his head.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Spila la crowna polani! The Minions JUMP through the crown tunnel’s opening. They land on the crown, taken down the tunnel...

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Bob, prakash! Bob uses Herb’s suit to rip open the top of the display c like a can opener. But before he can grab the crown, the platform stops moving! EXT: TOWER OF LONDON - QUEEN’S ENTRANCE - CONTINUOUS 47 A pair of CURTAINS move aside, revealing Royal Guards. Th display case moves forward on a conveyor belt. A guard TAKES the crown and walks outside with it, follow by other guards. The Minions, hiding in the platform, peer out.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: (sadly) La crowna...  48 MINIONS BL Draft 52. The guard carries the crown over to a waiting GOLDEN CARRIAGE.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: The Minions run after the carriage.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: La crowna! Speeda! Comeriga! The Queen politely waves from the carriage as throngs of onlookers CHEER and WAVE. The crown is ON HER HEAD.

dialogues.speaker: THE QUEEN
dialogues.text: Hello! The Minions RUN THROUGH THE CROWD, trying to keep up. As Bob runs, his STRETCH-SUIT LEGS spring out, telescopin and making his legs longer.

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: Hey! Looka me! He GRABS Kevin with one hand. GRABS Stuart with the other He begins to chase after the carriage on his long legs. The Queen continues to wave from her carriage.

dialogues.speaker: THE QUEEN
dialogues.text: Hello! Bobbies, The Royal Guard, and Beefeaters are stunned!

dialogues.speaker: BOBBIE 1
dialogues.text: Stonin’ crows!

dialogues.speaker: BOBBIE 2
dialogues.text: Stop him, lads! Go for the legs! They chase after Bob, grabbing his long legs and tripping him. Kevin and Stuart fling forward. Kevin lands on one of the horses, which sends them BOLTING down the street. The hor KICKS Kevin into the driver’s seat, knocking the DRIVER o the street. The Bobbies continue to pin Bob to the ground by his legs

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: Kevin!  49 50 51 MINIONS BL Draft 53. He manages to pull away from them. He JUMPS onto a roofto using his long legs to propel him.

dialogues.speaker: BOBBIE 2
dialogues.text: (into radio) The Queen’s been kidnapped, Sarge!

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: The Sergeant speaks back into his radio.

dialogues.speaker: SERGEANT
dialogues.text: Blimey! The Sergeant presses a button and alerts the entire polic force, who chase the runaway carriage through the streets

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: The carriage is out of control. Kevin takes the reins. Meanwhile, Bob uses his long legs to run across London rooftops. He falls down to the street, SCREAMING and DODG cars with his acrobatic, retractable legs. A CAR knocks h into a ball and he begins to ROLL until he falls down an MANHOLE. BACK TO THE QUEEN. The carriage is still out of control.

dialogues.speaker: THE QUEEN
dialogues.text: What’s going on?? Stuart JUMPS INTO THE CARRIAGE.

dialogues.speaker: STUART
dialogues.text: Hello! He attempts to GRAB THE CROWN off of the Queen’s head.

dialogues.speaker: STUART, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Gimme la crowna! He tackles her and a struggle ensues. Stuart manages to g the crown for a moment, but then the Queen GRABS it and begins to PUMMEL Stuart.

dialogues.speaker: THE QUEEN
dialogues.text: Gentlemen--do--not--steal--ladies’-- crowns!  52 53 54 MINIONS BL Draft 54.

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: In the manhole, a TRAIN approaches. BOB lifts himself up the train passes through his legs before it begins to dra him along as well. Bob SCREAMS.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: Kevin sees that they are headed straight for the RIVER

dialogues.speaker: THAMES
dialogues.text: Kevin tries to stop the carriage, but accidentally releas the horses instead. The carriage continues to speed towar the water. Bob pulls himself to the surface from the sewer. He grabs the carriage as it passes over the manhole and climbs on In an attempt to stop the carriage, Bob grabs it with one and one leg and shoots the long arm and leg across the street, grabbing a light post. He holds on tight! He stops the carriage from falling into the river, but it quickly rubber-bands back onto the street, still out of control. The strain makes the LONG ARMS POP AND SMOKE as Bob holds tight, forcing the carriage OFF ITS PATH and down SWORD A THE STONE SQUARE. TOURISTS RUN OUT OF THE WAY... ...revealing the carriage is headed RIGHT FOR A TREE NEAR

dialogues.speaker: EXCALIBUR
dialogues.text: Kevin and Bob SCREAM! Queen and Stuart peer out the back window of the carriage, SCREAMING!

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: WHAM! The carriage CRUNCHES against a tree. Kevin and Stuart FALL OFF. Stuart has the crown on his head! He LAUGHS triumphantly. But then the Queen grabs it from behind.

dialogues.speaker: THE QUEEN
dialogues.text: You scoundrel! (to the police) After them! Two BOBBIES JUMP and capture Kevin and Stuart. Bob contin to run toward THE SWORD IN THE STONE...  55 56 MINIONS BL Draft 55.

dialogues.speaker: BOBBIES
dialogues.text: Tackle him! Stop the blighter! Grab him! ..-and with NO EFFORT AT ALL, pulls the sword from the st EVERYONE GASPS! A LIGHT shines down from the heavens. DOV circle overhead. A CHOIR OF BOYS (AND A BOBBIE) begins to SING a hymn. EVERYONE DROPS TO ONE KNEE. Kevin and Stuart are confused

dialogues.speaker: BOBBIE
dialogues.text: Cor, blimey!

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: A BRITISH NEWS REPORTER is in the middle of a news report He prepares TEA as he reads. We see FOOTAGE of Bob holding the sword, Queen Elizabeth giving him the crown.

dialogues.speaker: BRITISH NEWS REPORTER, (TO CAMERA)
dialogues.text: One of England’s most famous myths has become a reality-- (takes a sip of tea) --as a new king has been crowned. Bob, who appears to be a bald jaundiced child, has pulled the famed sword right from its stone, which, legend dictates, makes HIM the new king.

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: Scarlet is watching the news broadcast at home. Scarlet S TAKES the martini she’s drinking.

dialogues.speaker: TINY. YELLOW. TRAITORS
dialogues.text: She angrily KICKS over the TV monitor. She gets in the Scarlet Jet. She ANGRILY pulls back the throttle. The jet ROCKETS FORWARD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 57 58 59 60 61 62 MINIONS BL Draft 56.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: The Minions have tied a chain of inner tubes to a barge t travel by sea.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: The Minions happily climb onto a dock with the Sydney Ope House in the background.

dialogues.speaker: MINIONS
dialogues.text: England! England! England!

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: We see the Minions traveling in Kangaroos’ pouches, becom nauseated.

dialogues.speaker: MINIONS
dialogues.text: (nauceous ) England...England...

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: They reach a large GORGE between “Australia” on one side “India” on the other. One Minion attempts to jump over it but FALLS. His jacket catches on a BRANCH. The Minions behind him use their bodies to form a BRIDGE cross over successfully. The fallen Minion is then seen waving for the other Minions to help him.

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: The Minions DANCE alongside several Indian dancers. EXT: “MOON” — DAY 62 As Astronauts plant the flag on the moon’s surface, the Minions walk by. PULL OUT to reveal they are on a soundstage. Yes, the moo landing is FAKE, deal with it.

dialogues.speaker: DIRECTOR, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: cUT!!  63 64 65 MINIONS BL Draft 57.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: The Minions CLING to an airplane wing as they continue th journey.

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: Bob sits in his limo, dressed in full royal garb and look out the window, LAUGHING with Kevin and Stuart. The limo pulls up to Buckingham Palace. The ROYAL ADVISER opens the door.

dialogues.speaker: ROYAL ADVISER
dialogues.text: Hello, King Bob. Welcome to Buckingham Palace. Bob sees the Royal Guard, lined up, intimidating in their official uniforms. He shuts the door to the limo.

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: Uhh...no.

dialogues.speaker: ROYAL ADVISER
dialogues.text: Oh, what’s the matter, your majesty? Whatever's bothering you WE can make it right, just name it! Bob smiles.

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: Oh.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: All the Guards are clad in MINION COSTUMES. MUCH better f Bob. As he walks the red carpet, he hugs each one around legs.

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: Awwww buddies! Buddies! Buddies! A podium on the balcony before a massive crowd. Before Bo steps up, Kevin wipes another smudge off his face. Bob approaches and ADDRESSES the crowd completely in gibberis He begins with:

dialogues.speaker: KING BOB
dialogues.text: The crowd CHEERS.  66 MINIONS BL Draft 58.

dialogues.speaker: CROWD
dialogues.text: King Bob! Yay! King Bob! Bob continues his long-winded, impassioned speech. He mak a few jokes, which only Kevin and Stuart LAUGH at. When h concludes, the crowd stares at him blankly. He glances ba to the Royal Adviser, who SHRUGS.

dialogues.speaker: KING BOB
dialogues.text: The crowd applauds again. Bob DROPS the mic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Minions RUN throughout the palace, LAUGHING and goofi around. The BUTLERS chase them, trying to maintain order they slide on bannisters, etc.

dialogues.speaker: THIN BUTLER
dialogues.text: King Bob!! Kevin PLAYS POLO while riding a CORGI. A group of other P PLAYERS follows behind, stampeding through the room. Stuart finds the STEAM ROOM and SMILES. He takes off his overalls, revealing THONG underwear beneath. Bob continually RINGS a BELL and hides, confusing the BUT

dialogues.speaker: BUTLER
dialogues.text: Yes King Bob? Oh. King Bob? King Bob...? Stuart is now in the Steam Room, with two YELLOW FIRE HYDRANTS at his side. He hits on them and KISSES them.

dialogues.speaker: STUART
dialogues.text: Ah, Claire...Tiffany...mi bellas. Rawr. Bob POSES for a very regal portrait while Stuart lounges around, playing his ukulele. Kevin BATS the polo ball toward the door... ...where SCARLET OVERKILL STOMPS IN WITH A LARGE RAY GUN!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BL Draft 59. The ball HITS her in the face, and then a Corgi TACKLES h as well. She gets up, FUMING. She holds the Corgi, who LI her face. The PORTRAIT PAINTER quickly runs out of the ro

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Scarlet!

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Don’t you “Scarlet” me, you backstabbing little traitors! Using Herb’s invention to steal my crown?

dialogues.speaker: HERB OVERKILL
dialogues.text: I feel used. Not gonna lie.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: You stole my dream! I was going to conquer England some day! There was going to be a coronation, and I was going to be made QUEEN. Every moment was planned, I’d wear a dress so sparkly it glowed, and EVERYONE WHO EVER DOUBTED ME would be watching, and they would be CRYING. I was going to be the picture of elegance and class and you PINHEADS screwed it up! Kevin offers Scarlet the crown and tries to explain that did it all for her.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: La crowna, para tu.

dialogues.speaker: ROYAL ADVISER
dialogues.text: No, no, no, King Bob! You cannot just abdicate the throne! Scarlet points her gun at the Royal Adviser.

dialogues.speaker: HERB OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Who invited the square?

dialogues.speaker: ROYAL ADVISER
dialogues.text: And you DEFINITELY cannot just GIVE the job to THIS woman. There are laws!

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: Laws? Maka te laws.

dialogues.speaker: HARD CUT TO
dialogues.text: MINIONS BL Draft 60.

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: Parliament is packed. Everyone has gathered to watch Bob, wearing a Parliament wig, pound the gavel and rant.

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: La keena pota Scarlet po papeil!

dialogues.speaker: BRITISH NEWSCASTER 1
dialogues.text: King Bob has officially changed the law, clearing the way for Scarlet Overkill to be crowned QUEEN OF ENGLAND! She will be coronated at London’s historic Westminster Abbey. If I wasn’t so polite, I'd say this spells certain doom for the country, if not the world. But I’m so very polite, that I shall keep my mouth shut. (a beat) But seriously. We’re all in big trouble.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: Scarlet is talking to reporters.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: I don’t have time to answer any questions, I just want to thank the Minions, for going above and beyond the call of duty. You are three tiny, golden pill-shaped miracle workers, and you have stolen not just England, but my heart. She HUGS them. The Minions look touched.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Shana tova, le buddies? Scarlet continues to smile for the cameras.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Pardon me? Kevin takes out his wallet, shows her a huge fold-out collection of pictures of his buddies. She looks at it.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: La triba!  69 MINIONS BL Draft 61.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: WOW, so many! Good for you. Well, you'll all get what you deserve! The Minions are EXCITED! This is it! They follow her, and begin singing THE MONKEES’ THEME, ma more Minion-centric. She leads them through numerous rooms, still singing. The walk through the kitchen, bathroom, etc.

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: She leads them down a stairwell. The Minions walk down, singing... They arrive at a door at the bottom of a stairwell, confu

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Go ahead, go ahead! They enter the room. She SLAMS the door. Looks in on them from the window.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Blumock. They see where they are: AN OLD FASHIONED DUNGEON. Skeletons. Cobwebs. Cells drip dirty water. AND TORTURE DEVICES. Lots and lots of Torture Devices.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: I don’t want you to take this the wrong way, but I hate you. I thought I could get over what you did, but I feel so betrayed. I think, yes, I think we’re gonna have to break up. And it’s not you...oh wait, hold on. It is you. It’s 100% you.

dialogues.speaker: MINIONS
dialogues.text: No, no!

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: So get comfortable, Minions. Get real, real comfortable. Because this is where you’re going to spend the rest of your worthless little lives.  70 MINIONS BL Draft 62. She leaves.

dialogues.speaker: HERB OVERKILL, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Alright, let’s do this! The Minions know that voice. They turn around: REVEAL: It’s Herb, wearing an executioner mask. And his p striped suit.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Moca le Herb!

dialogues.speaker: HERB OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Who's this handsome Herb fella? No, my name is...Blerb, I'ma, a dungeon master. PREPARE FOR

dialogues.speaker: TORTURE, WHICH I DO
dialogues.text: HARD CUT: The Minions are on a STRETCHING RACK. They are frightened. Herb STANDS BEFORE a WHEEL. HERB OVERKILL (CONT’D) Alright, are we comfy? DOESN'T

dialogues.speaker: MATTER, THIS IS TORTURE
dialogues.text: He SPINS the WHEEL before him, the Minions stretch... ..+.-and are surprisingly OKAY!

dialogues.speaker: HERB OVERKILL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (to himself) Wow, harder than I thought. Next machine!

dialogues.speaker: HARD CUT
dialogues.text: HERB OVERKILL (CONT’D) Uh, welcome to Hang-Town, population: YOU! Kevin is in a noose. Herb PULLS A CORD... The floor gives out below Kevin. However, due to his shap he’s completely fine. Bob, excitedly, goes next! He’s fine!  MINIONS BL Draft 63. Finally, Stuart LEAPS THROUGH and does some IMPRESSIVE CI DE SOLEIL type moves via the dangling noose. HERB OVERKILL (CONT’D) Guys, cut it out! This is really unprofessional! The Minions are playing with the equipment, having a grea time. Herb tries to stop them. HERB OVERKILL (CONT’D) There’s no laughing in the dungeon! I wanna see tears, and I wanna hear screams or I am gonna get-- (notices an old-fashioned torture device) Wait. Oooh! I’ve got a groovy idea! He takes a photograph of it. HARD CUT: Herb is in a stockade. HERB OVERKILL (CONT’D) Look at this! He pretends he’s dead as Kevin takes a picture. We see a bunch of pictures taken by the Minions during th torture. Having the time of their lives with Herb. The Minions and Herb leaf through the pictures, laughing, share good times. Herb takes a selfie as he holds a spear behind his head, making it look like it’s gone through his skull.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (OVER INTERCOM)
dialogues.text: Hello! Will the future King Herb Overkill please come upstairs to prepare for the coronation?

dialogues.speaker: HERB OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Well, I hope you learned your lesson for today.

dialogues.speaker: MINIONS
dialogues.text: Si si! Buena!

dialogues.speaker: HERB OVERKILL
dialogues.text: And by the way: (pulls off mask) It was, me, Herb, the WHOLE TIME!  71 MINIONS BL Draft 64. He leaves. And then comes back. HERB OVERKILL (CONT’D) I don’t even KNOW anyone named Blerb! He leaves again. The Minions run for the door, but it SHU

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: Scarlet is getting her hair done by the very chic FABRICE

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: I am HOURS AWAY from becoming the Queen of England!

dialogues.speaker: FABRICE
dialogues.text: I know! It’s a gas!

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: I will FINALLY get my crown!

dialogues.speaker: FABRICE
dialogues.text: Yeah...

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: It’s all I’ve ever wanted! I’m going to be so happy! Scarlet is looking in a mirror, getting ready for the coronation.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: But...let me ask you something, Fabrice. (points to hair) Does THAT--- She holds up a CRAYON DRAWING that she did of herself as young girl.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (holds up picture) ---look like THIS to you?

dialogues.speaker: FABRICE
dialogues.text: Mmmhmm. Mrs. Overkill, the hair in that picture, it’s just two wavy lines.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Oh, so what, now you’re an art critic?  MINIONS BL Draft 65.

dialogues.speaker: FABRICE
dialogues.text: Oh, but--

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: I drew that when I was five years old! (angry) Get out of my sight! Missiles EXTEND FROM HER DRESS, she FIRES THEM at Fabrice ..-knocking him out of the castle. Herb walks in, looks out the hole in the wall caused by Fabrice.

dialogues.speaker: HERB OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Bye Fabrice. (to Scarlet) I liked him. He was fun. So what do you think of the dress?

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Oh, it’s so beautiful. SO fashion forward. So Valentino.

dialogues.speaker: HERB OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Gave it a sweetheart neckline because you’re my sweetheart. The high collar and cinched waist reflect a simpler, more violent time. The material is a blend of taffeta and high density body armor. Fully armed and loaded. And that glow, that’s nuclear.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Nice...Just one more thing to do. Gotta look good for the public, uggh. Do you mind?

dialogues.speaker: HERB OVERKILL
dialogues.text: My pleasure. Herb pulls tight on her corset.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Little tighter, sweetie. (pulled tighter) Come on, I can take it. (pulled tighter) Little tighter. Tighter. (pulled tighter) Must...have...tiny waist.  72 73 74 75 MINIONS BL Draft 66. A BUTLER walks in on the scene holding a tray of coffee.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Seeing stars, seeing stars...losing feeling in my legs, perfect...tight, tight, tight... The Butler awkwardly backs out of the room.

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: Kevin notices a SEWER GRATE! Kevin and Stuart pull off th grating.

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: Me helpa! Me helpa! They toss it onto Bob, who can barely support it.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: La sartod!

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: Helpa me! Helpa me!

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: Kevin, Stuart and Bob make their way through the sewer, trying to make it to Scarlet. Bob PETS a RAT. They climb up a ladder, out of the sewer...

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: The Minions PUSH THROUGH FLOORBOARDS... ..-and see they have made it into a funeral home...where funeral is going on. Family members gather around a coffi

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Uh se para...una otra. Kevin and Stuart leave...

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: Kevin and Stuart walk on...but where’s Bob? He drops down the ladder, clutching a FUNERAL WREATH.  76 77 78 MINIONS BL Draft 67.

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: Para la Scarlet! Kevin thinks for a moment. He pulls out a pen and crosses out “FOR YOUR LOSS” and adds “SCARLET.” A BUMBLEBEE flies into the wreath. Bob doesn’t notice. He beckons the rat to come along with them. The Minions climb up another ladder.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: They POP UP beneath a sewer cover. They are in the ABBEY ROAD crosswalk, peeking out beneath the lid. We see the l of THE BEATLES step on top of the Minions as they walk ac the street.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: Scarlet’s carriage and caravan heads down the street. The MAN DRESSED AS SCARLET from Villain Con pushes through th crowd and shouts to Scarlet.

dialogues.speaker: MAN DRESSED AS SCARLET
dialogues.text: I love you, Scarlet!

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: (to crowd) Queen wave, queen wave! Queen waving!

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: Villains rise as Scarlet walks into the sprawling main ro Thousands of candles. Huge chandeliers. Scarlet proceeds down the center aisle with Herb.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: I’m so SO excited, this is PERFECT! Everyone looks so nice... She GRABS Tina Nelson’s face and SHAKES it.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh, you are just adorable.

dialogues.speaker: TINA
dialogues.text: Oh yes!  79 MINIONS BL Draft 68.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: And that MUSIC, oh, who IS that organist? She is good, right? She looks like an Edna? (to organist) Edna! You are very good! The Elderly Lady Organist gives her the thumbs up. They approach the ARCHBISHOP, flanked by MOBSTERS on eith side.

dialogues.speaker: HERB OVERKILL
dialogues.text: (to Archbishop) Thanks for doing this, padre. Big fan. Scarlet, in her exuberance, SQUEEZES HIS FACE.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Come here, let me squeeze you! Ooh! You are so squishy!

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: The Minions lift up a manhole cover and see that they are right in front of Westminster Abbey. Bob is still carryin the rat.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Go, go, go! They run up to the door of the Abbey. They try to open it It’s locked. Stuart RAMS his head against the wood.

dialogues.speaker: STUART
dialogues.text: Ouch, ouch... Kevin decides to try another way. Bob tries to take the rat.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Le poochy, sayonara! Kevin motions the rat can’t come any further. The rat loo at Bob. Bob looks at the rat.

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: Ciao, le poochy. He then begins to sing “Auld Lang Syne” as a goodbye song the Rat (aka “Poochy”).  80 MINIONS BL Draft 69. Kevin YANKS HIM OFF-SCREEN.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: (sighs, annoyed) Bob...komay! Stuart!

dialogues.speaker: STUART
dialogues.text: (dazed) Si, si...

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: The Minions begin to scale the wall of the Abbey. Bob WAV to a Pigeon nesting on a ledge. They make it to the roof. Kevin looks inside...

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Okay, la comme.

dialogues.speaker: ARCHBISHOP, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Will you to your power cause law and justice... The Bee from the wreath flies around Stuart’s head. He sw at it. Then it lands on Bob’s forehead. Stuart SMACKS Bob in the forehead, and Bob begins to CRY. Stuart APOLOGIZES But then the Bee lands on Bob again. Stuart HITS him agai causing a SLAP-FIGHT. But then the bee begins to chase af both of them! They run away and JUMP INTO THE CHARGE... ...landing on a CHANDELIER. They begin to run in circles away from the bee on the chandelier, causing it to UNSCRE from the ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: No, no, no... Kevin looks and sees Scarlet and Herb right beneath the chandelier.

dialogues.speaker: ARCHBISHOP, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Do you Scarlet Overkill, solemnly promise... Stuart and Bob SWITCH directions as they run away from th bee, causing the chandelier to screw back into place.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Se bona! Yeah!  MINIONS BL Draft 70. But then they change directions again.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Nooo! Kevin makes his way over to the chandelier on a support w He SLAPS the bee away. Bob and Stuart are exhausted. They lay on the chandelier, which stops spinning. Kevin, still holding onto the support wire, REACHES for Stuart and Bob. They grab his hand, but Bob’s foot GETS STUCK on the chandelier. It begins to teeter. Below, the crown is about to be placed on Scarlet’s head. She GIGGLES with excitement as the Archbishop holds the crown.

dialogues.speaker: ARCHBISHOP
dialogues.text: I proclaim thee, Scarlet Overkill, the Queen of England! The Archbishop is about to put the crown on Scarlet’s hea She's ecstatic! We've never seen a human being SMILE THIS BIG! But then... Scarlet notices the chandelier falling toward her. But she also sees Kevin and the Minions dangl above.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: The chandelier finally UNSCREWS completely, PLUMMETING to ground. Kevin manages to grab Stuart and Bob before it falls. The chandelier SLAMS DOWN on Scarlet. Hard.

dialogues.speaker: HERB OVERKILL
dialogues.text: (crying) Scarlet! Scarlet, my queen! (to villains) Somebody help me! The Villains rush toward Herb. The Minions quietly slide down the curtain, getting them ground level. They run into the crowd. A few villains try to pull up the chandelier. HERB OVERKILL (CONT’D) (crying) Come on, come on...lift on two!

dialogues.speaker: ONE--TWO
dialogues.text: 81 MINIONS BL Draft 71. They’re almost at the door...when they hear a LOUD CRASH. Scarlet’s dress ACTIVATES. She SHOOTS UP and TOSSES THE CHANDELIER into the air. She hovers above the crowd. Bruised. Harried. Chest heaving, ENRAGED. HERB OVERKILL (CONT’D) Scarlet! You’re okay! She puts up her hand, points with a shaking finger.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Villains! This is no longer a coronation. She DRAMATICALLY and FURIOUSLY POINTS at the Minions! SCARLET OVERKILL (CONT’D) It is an EXECUTION! GET THEM! The Villains begin to CHASE after the Minions through the hallways of the Abbey. The Nelsons stand by, watching in horror.

dialogues.speaker: WALTER
dialogues.text: Whoa, nelly! Run, fellas, run!

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: The Minions CRASH through stained glass windows, run for A beat later... The Villains burst through the building in HOT PURSUIT, taking out the ENTIRE FRONT OF THE BUILDING. The Minions run for it... The villains are gaining on the Minions. A grenade is hurled. Then the Villain who threw the grena is hurled. He ROLLS right past the Minions. The Minions HIDE in a telephone booth. But it’s occupied a HOCKEY MASK VILLAIN, who chases them away.  MINIONS BL Draft 72. A COWBOY VILLAIN tries to lasso the Minions, but ends up tripping some of the villains. Then a HUGE DRILLING TANK drills its way through the grou A SOVIET VILLAIN steps out of the vehicle with an AXE. Stuart and Bob run away.

dialogues.speaker: SOVIET VILLAIN
dialogues.text: You're mine!

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Stuart! Bob! Kevin RUNS in the opposite direction. Stuart and Bob are chased by a CLOWN VILLAIN on a UNICYCL He pulls up next to them, juggling grenades. He drops the grenades on the ground. They EXPLODE. Stuart turns a corn but runs into the STOMACH of the Sumo Villain.

dialogues.speaker: SUMO VILLAIN
dialogues.text: Huh? Hey! I got one! The Broadsword Villain reaches for Kevin, but misses. Kev RUNS around a light pole. The Broadsword Villain RAISES h sword, hitting the Soviet Villain. He then SWINGS at the light pole. He misses Kevin, and the light from the pole FALLS onto Broadsword Villain’s head. Bob continues to run, and CLIMBS over a wall. He hides behind the wall, thinking he’s safe. FRANKIE FISH-LIPS EMERGES from a puddle of water, looking sad and helpless. Bob PATS his head. But then Fish Lips GRABS Bob, pulling underwater. Kevin continues to run, calling for Stuart and Bob. But they’re nowhere to be found. We PAN DOWN, BENEATH THE GROUND...to see the Minion tribe arriving in the London Underground Station. They step off the train and march through the platform.

dialogues.speaker: TRAIN STATION ANNOUNCER, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: (repeating) Mind the gap.

dialogues.speaker: MINIONS
dialogues.text: Mind the gap! Mind the gap! Mind the gap! One Minion SCREAMS in a CHILD’s face.

dialogues.speaker: MINION ON PLATFORM
dialogues.text: Mind the gap!!!  82 83 MINIONS BL Draft 73.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: Kevin keeps running. He sees a dirty pub with the blinds pulled, but the lights on. This is THE PIG'S SPLEEN. He runs in. INT: THE PIG’S SPLEEN - NIGHT 83 Kevin runs in. Breathing heavily, he ducks down as the VILLAINS OUTSIDE pass. He sighs, tries to catch his breath. The crowd inside is raucously LAUGHING and PARTYING.

dialogues.speaker: THE QUEEN, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Hahaha! Oh, what about this one? Hahaha! Why did the Queen go to the Dentist? To get her teeth

dialogues.speaker: CROWNED
dialogues.text: Much laughter. That voice sounds familiar. Kevin looks: It’s the Queen, standing at the bar!

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: La Queena!

dialogues.speaker: BAR PATRON
dialogues.text: Tell us another one, Lizzy!

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Uh...bello... The Queen turns and sees Kevin.

dialogues.speaker: THE QUEEN
dialogues.text: Oh. It’s you. Everyone, this is one of the little fellows who stole the monarchy from me. And how's that working out for you? Kevin starts telling the Queen about the trouble they’re THE QUEEN (CONT’D) Oh yes yes, I saw what was going on on the telly.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Telly?  84 MINIONS BL Draft 74. Kevin sees the TV behind the bar is showing footage outsi of WESTMINSTER ABBEY.

dialogues.speaker: BRITISH NEWS REPORTER, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: What was meant to be the coronation of Scarlet Overkill has gone terribly wrong, as--- Scarlet KICKS HIM out of the way.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: MOVE! !---Kevin! Kevin, I KNOW YOU'RE OUT THERE! You think you’ve GOTTEN AWAY? Well, what do we have

dialogues.speaker: HERE
dialogues.text: She holds up a TIED UP Stuart and Bob!

dialogues.speaker: BOB, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: Bello!

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Bob! Stuart? Behind Scarlet, the tribe of Minions start filing out of London Underground.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: Oh my goodness! Which one shall I kill first? Little Bob? Stuart? Bob? Stuart? Hmm? I will do it, Kevin, if you are not back here by

dialogues.speaker: DAWN
dialogues.text: Scarlet KICKS THE CAMERA OVER, as the screen CUTS TO STAT

dialogues.speaker: THE QUEEN
dialogues.text: Oh my! Kevin looks at the TV, scared...

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: No! Les buddies! He STORMS OUT of the pub, pushing patrons out of the way.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: Villains patrol the streets around Castle Scarlet. Kevin sneaks down the alley ways...  85 86 87 88 MINIONS BL Draft 75. ...-narrowly avoiding them as he heads onto the castle grounds. But unbeknownst to Kevin... The Sumo Villain spots him. He turns to the other villain

dialogues.speaker: SUMO VILLAIN
dialogues.text: Ha ha ha...there he IS!

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: A vent is kicked open from the inside. Kevin crawls out. INT: CASTLE SCARLET - HERB’S LABORATORY - NIGHT 86 Kevin enters, steps over a laser security beam, b-lines f some weapons.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: The Sumo leads the charge.

dialogues.speaker: SUMO VILLAIN
dialogues.text: Follow me! INT: CASTLE SCARLET - HERB’S LABORATORY - NIGHT 88 Kevin loads up the lava lamp gun. Grabs a phaser. Some dynamite. Some knives. A rocket backpack. He looks in the mirror. Pretty cool.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: (to reflection) Whooda man? He looks particularly buff. But then his reflection chang angles, causing him to look short and fat.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (disappointed) Oh. But then he hears the villains at the door!  89 90 91 MINIONS BL Draft 76.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: The Villains are using SUMO as a battering ram to take do the door!

dialogues.speaker: SUMO VILLAIN
dialogues.text: Harder! It’s just my head! CRASH! They manage to BREAK DOWN THE DOOR! INT: CASTLE SCARLET - HERB’S LABORATORY - NIGHT 90 The villains are coming! Kevin is panicking! He takes off his gear and accidentally TRIPS into Herb’s Ultimate Weapon! Closes the door... .--his butt BUMPS into some buttons, the Weapon LIGHTS UP Startled, he bumps into a button labeled “DO NOT PUSH THI BUTTON.” Then into a switch marked “DO NOT FLIP THIS SWITCH.” Then he accidentally pulls a lever marked “DO NO PULL THIS LEVER.” Nothing happens. He BREATHES a SIGH of relief. But that triggers an opening marked “DO NOT BLOW INTO THIS HOLE.”

dialogues.speaker: ULTIMATE WEAPON, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Ultimate Weapon Initiated. Activation in 3...2...1... The Villains are RUSHING towards Herb’s lab! They BURST I They're running RIGHT FOR THE POWERS BOOTH! They RAISE THEIR WEAPONS, ready to SMASH KEVIN and THE ULTIMATE WEAPON--— WHOOOOSH! His shadow GROWS over the Villains... ...and KEEPS GROWING.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: The walls CRACK. Break APART. Towers TOPPLE! Villains SPILL OUT OF EVERY CRACK, DOOR, and WINDOW! Something is PUSHING THEM OUT!

dialogues.speaker: SOMETHING BIG
dialogues.text: 92 93 MINIONS BL Draft 77. A GIANT GLOVED HAND shoots out the top window. Another GIANT GLOVED HAND PUNCHES THROUGH THE OTHER SIDE the castle! GIANT FEET BREAK OUT FROM THE BOTTOM, lift the CASTLE off foundation! The castle CRACKS like an eggshell, breaks off, revealing

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Bello! The Villains RUN FOR IT!

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: Kevin looks out over the city. He means BUSINESS.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: Stuart and Bob are tied to every piece of TNT that could found in England in under five minutes. It’s a lot. Scarl knows people.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: This is IT, boys. Things do NOT look good for you. She holds up Tim.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh. And I’m KEEPING the bear.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: You're not gonna need him where YOU'RE going. (whispers, “between you and me”) Heaven.  94 95 96 97 98 MINIONS BL Draft 78.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: Kevin WALKS DOWN THE STREET. Fierce look of determination his face. Kevin SHOOS away some birds, which fly right pa his face. But then... ...-THUCK! He stops in his tracks. REVEAL: he is stuck between buildings. He is TOO BIG. He tries to wedge himself out. He continues to the next building...

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: Scarlet and Herb LIGHT the fuse.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: (makes Tim’s arm wave) “Bye bye, say bye bye, Bob. Bye bye!"

dialogues.speaker: STUART
dialogues.text: Ay yay yay yay...

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: Kevin SQUEEZES between buildings, past an office where several typists are working. They barely notice the giant Minion walking past the window. A WOMAN applying lipstick SMEARS it across her face when sees giant Kevin. Kevin is trying to make his way through heavy traffic. He still having trouble squeezing his way between buildings.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: Scarlet and Herb run away from the dynamite, LAUGHING.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: Stuart and Bob watch helplessly as the fuse is about to R

dialogues.speaker: THE EXPLOSIVES
dialogues.text: Scarlet and Herb watch from a nearby alleyway, LAUGHING.. Kevin GRABS THEM just in time!  99 100 MINIONS BL Draft 79. Scarlet looks up at him, in annoyed awe.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Wait, What? How did he...? (annoyed) Hold my bear. But the chain of dynamite is COMING AT STUART AND BOB fas Scarlet’s dress enters ATTACK MODE. It begins growing, transforming... TURBINES pop out the back allowing for flight. All sorts of WEAPONS pop out from ALL SIDES! The dynamite continues to go off...but then a GUSH OF WAT puts out the wick! Is Kevin peeing on it? Sure looks that way... .--but NO, he’s using water from a FIRE HYDRANT! He screws the hydrant back in place.

dialogues.speaker: STUART
dialogues.text: Whoo-hooo! (looks over Kevin's shoulder)

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Kevin turns... ...to see Scarlet FLYING RIGHT AT HIM! LAVA CANNONS pop o on either side of her dress!

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: So, that’s your plan? Make yourself a BIGGER TARGET? She unleashes the lava at Kevin!

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: Meanwhile, the Minion tribe is inside a TEA ROOM. They se Giant Kevin RUN PAST and they run out the door.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: Scarlet CHARGES Kevin, knocking Stuart and Bob out of his hand! He catches them just in time.  MINIONS BL Draft 80.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Hahahaha! She CHARGES HIM AGAIN, knocking him to the ground! Stuart and Bob spill out onto the pavement.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: And SO HELP ME, I never want to see another one of your goofy, bug-eyed faces EVER AGAIN!

dialogues.speaker: MINIONS
dialogues.text: Scarlet! Scarlet! Scarlet! Scarlet looks down... ...and sees THE MINION TRIBE MARCHING down the street tow her. VERY EXCITED!

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: What?? Oh you gotta be kidding me! She AIMS her guns at the Minion tribe. The Minions RUN FO It!

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh no you don’t! She fires a lava-gun, blocking the Minions’ path!

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: And just for the record my little deviled eggs, you can thank KEVIN for what I’m about to do to you! Kevin rises behind Scarlet, BACK-HANDS her... ..+.-sending her through a building. And another. And another. One building COLLAPSES. A BRITISH MAN on his balcony reading the newspaper doesn’t even notice. The Minions CHEER! Stuart and Bob HUG their friends.

dialogues.speaker: WOOO-HOOO
dialogues.text: Kevin greets the Minion tribe and begins to kiss them. He accidentally picks up one of them with his mouth. He hold the spit-drenched Minion in his hand.

dialogues.speaker: SPIT-DRENCHED MINION
dialogues.text: Ewww!  MINIONS BL Draft 81. A seriously angry Scarlet ROCKETS OVERHEAD. Her dress is OPENING UP TO ITS FINAL STAGE.

dialogues.speaker: ENOUGH
dialogues.text: Scarlet’s dress expands, the nuclear CORE is revealed dea center of the dress... -..as it AIMS at the Minions. Scarlet ZIPS UP INTO THE AIR. She FIRES! The missile sails THROUGH THE AIR, letting out a LOUD SLO BEEP as it heads right for the Minions. But THEN! Kevin LEAPS OVER THE TRIBE, getting between them and the nuclear missile. Seeing NO OTHER ALTERNATIVE... ..-he SWALLOWS IT! The Minion tribe is horrified.

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: Kevin!!! We hear the beeping coming from his mouth. He’s unsure of what to do.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Hahaha, you imbecile! Have fun exploding! Scarlet swoops down and grabs Herb.

dialogues.speaker: HERB OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Baby! She flies up into the air.... HERB OVERKILL (CONT’D) Whoa, what’s the rush?

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Got to get out of here!-- Kevin's hand REACHES INTO FRAME and grabs them! She tries to pry herself LOOSE.  101 MINIONS BL Draft 82.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Let US GO! She tries to PULL AWAY from Kevin... ...but he DOESN’T LET GO! Scarlet and Herb ROCKET HIGH OVER LONDON... ...TAKING KEVIN WITH THEM! He won’t let go! The beeping from Kevin's mouth is getting QUICKER AND QUICKER, it’s about to go OFF! Scarlet begins to activate dress to protect her and Herb.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: No no no no no...

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: BOOOOOOOO0000M! The Minions watch the explosion in the sk

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: (crying) Kevin!!! Tears are filling his goggles. Poochy arrives on the scen Stuart hands him to Bob.

dialogues.speaker: STUART
dialogues.text: Te, le poochy. Bob HUGS him and is happy for a moment. But then he immediately begins crying again.

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: Kevin la tota... Stuart begins to comfort Bob as he cries. The tribe begin humming TAPS for their fallen friend. Stuart joins in. Then, in the distance, from BEHIND THE TRIBE, Kevin SOARS using his overalls as a parachute! The Minions don’t noti

dialogues.speaker: AAAAAAH
dialogues.text: He FLIES right over them.

dialogues.speaker: LOOKA
dialogues.text: The Minions see him, and CHEER!  102 MINIONS BL Draft 83. The Minions try to catch him, the wind blowing him all ab makes them run back and forth. WHACK! He lands on the statue, hard. The Minions CHEER again!

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Wooo. Ouch.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: The Royal Carriage rolls up. The Minions step out of the carriage.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Stuart?

dialogues.speaker: STUART
dialogues.text: Hm?

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Bob?

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: Si? Kevin wipes a smudge from Bob's face. He takes a deep breath, proud.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Komay. They walk forward. A HUGE CROWD has gathered. They cheer for our heroes as they walk a long path toward the palace The Queen addresses the crowd. The Minions stand next to her.

dialogues.speaker: THE QUEEN
dialogues.text: Ladies and gentlemen, we are here today to celebrate the Minions. The crowd CHEERS. One of the Queen’s CORGIS licks a Minio tongue.

dialogues.speaker: MINION IN CROWD
dialogues.text: Blech! Blech!

dialogues.speaker: THE QUEEN
dialogues.text: The country owes you a great debt of gratitude. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MINIONS BL Draft 84.

dialogues.speaker: THE QUEEN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (to Bob) Bob, you were a wise and noble king for all of eight hours. So for you, I offer this tiny crown for your teddy bear, Tim.

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: Tri makasi, tri makasi! He jumps up and HUGS the Queen.

dialogues.speaker: THE QUEEN
dialogues.text: Oh, very good, Bob. The Nelsons are in the audience. Walter weeps tears of jo

dialogues.speaker: WALTER
dialogues.text: Oh, spectacular!

dialogues.speaker: MADGE
dialogues.text: I’m so proud of you boys!

dialogues.speaker: THE QUEEN
dialogues.text: Oh, Stuart. Stuart steps forward.

dialogues.speaker: STUART
dialogues.text: Ah, poirel!

dialogues.speaker: THE QUEEN
dialogues.text: For you, I have this beautiful super duper incredible snowglobe.

dialogues.speaker: STUART
dialogues.text: Poglobe?

dialogues.speaker: THE QUEEN
dialogues.text: And look, look-- (she shakes the globe) --hours of excitement!

dialogues.speaker: STUART
dialogues.text: (clearly disappointed) Oh, yippee...gracias... The Queen BURSTS OUT LAUGHING. Kevin joins in.

dialogues.speaker: THE QUEEN
dialogues.text: Oh, Stuart, we’re just MESSING WITH YOU. Don’t be mad at me, it was Kevin's idea. Stuart turns to Kevin, who SHRUGS, happily.  103 MINIONS BL Draft 85.

dialogues.speaker: STUART
dialogues.text: Kevin!

dialogues.speaker: THE QUEEN
dialogues.text: We have a much BETTER surprise for you. Kevin hands him a new GUITAR.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Un supa mega ukulele.

dialogues.speaker: STUART
dialogues.text: Coolos! Stuart does an amazing guitar solo and the CROWD goes wil The “Hair” Beefeaters are quite enjoying it. Stuart ENDS IT, VERY MUCH IN THE MOMENT, by SMASHING THE GUITAR. A beat. He begrudgingly takes the snowglobe from the Quee muttering as he walks away.

dialogues.speaker: THE QUEEN
dialogues.text: Right. Uh...and finally, Kevin!

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Si, mala keena?

dialogues.speaker: THE QUEEN
dialogues.text: You are a hero of the highest order. For your bravery and valor, I am knighting you. From here on out, you are Sir Kevin. Well done. Kevin smiles. The crowd CHEERS!

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: Stuart and Bob join Kevin. A great moment!

dialogues.speaker: NARRATOR, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: What a BEAUTIFUL moment. The nation, NAY the world was celebrating Kevin, Stuart, and Bob. The last few thousand years were rough, no question, but things were FINALLY going their way! ON KEVIN.  MINIONS BL Draft 86.

dialogues.speaker: NARRATOR, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Kevin had never been MORE proud. (slow realization) But something was missing... The Queen smiles, goes to scratch her head---

dialogues.speaker: THE QUEEN
dialogues.text: Ha ha, yes, good show, good show! q--- ---only to find her CROWN IS GONE! THE QUEEN (CONT’D) My crown is gone! It’s gone!! The Bobbies and Royal Guard begin searching the crowd...

dialogues.speaker: BOBBIE 1
dialogues.text: Blimey! ...-but Kevin sees SCARLET AND HERB RUNNING FROM THE SCEN

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Hey! HEY! Scarlet! Kevin runs after them.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: They took everything from me! My castle! My reputation! Things look bleak, baby, I’m not gonna lie! But now AT LEAST I HAVE MY

dialogues.speaker: CROWN
dialogues.text: SUDDENLY, Scarlet and Herb are hit by a RAY which FREEZES THEM IN A BLOCK OF ICE. The ice SLIDES across the ground until it is stopped by a FOOT. We see that the foot belongs to a YOUNG GRU. He is holding a FREEZE-RAY. Gru takes the crown.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Child, give me that BACK!

dialogues.speaker: LITTLE GRU
dialogues.text: No, I don’t think so.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: You have NO IDEA who you’re messing with! I am the greatest super villain of all time.  MINIONS BL Draft 87.

dialogues.speaker: LITTLE GRU
dialogues.text: Oh WERE you? (laughs ) Kevin, is in awe of the whole thing. Gru turns and sees him... -.-smiles at Kevin. Kevin smiles back. INSTANT CONNECTION. The rest of the tribe walks over.

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN
dialogues.text: Buddies! Komay! Looka! Gru hops on his bike. LITTLE KYLE waits for him in the si seat. He puts the crown on Kyle’s head. Gru GUNS IT. The bike CONVERTS into a jet... Kevin CAN'T TAKE IT ANYMORE! He points to Gru!

dialogues.speaker: KEVIN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: C’est le boss! C’est le boss! Komay! He runs after Gru. The Minion tribe follows.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL
dialogues.text: Ah! Get back here--Are you really going to allow that little penguin to make off with my crown? (slurp) Oh Herb, I’m done. Bob doubles back. He hands her the one the Queen gave Tim Scarlet is sincerely touched.

dialogues.speaker: SCARLET OVERKILL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (small gasp) ...for me? Aw.

dialogues.speaker: BOB
dialogues.text: Si, para tu. Bye bye! Bob runs offscreen. Kevin runs after the cycle. The Minions, including Bob, follow.  MINIONS BL Draft 88.

dialogues.speaker: NARRATOR, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: And THAT is how the Minions found their new boss. He was cunning, he was evil, he was perfect. He was...despicable. Gru rides into the SUNSET. We close-in on Gru’s face as h LAUGHS.

dialogues.speaker: THE END
dialogues.text: The CREDITS ROLL, interspersed with animated vignettes of and the Minions: --The Minions follow Gru in a single-file line. They bump into him and he shoos them away, but they only IMITATE hi shooing gesture. They begin to imitate all his other movements, until he begins RUNNING IN PLACE and they get tripped up and FALL OVER. --Gru peels a BANANA. The Minions see this and begin to surround him, until he RUNS AWAY offscreen with the Minio giving chase. Norbert FALLS while running and places his STARFISH strategically on his chest, as he did in the fil --Bob runs across the screen wearing the FAR OUT STRETCH SUIT. Gru follows, wearing his own suit, except he has clusters of Minions attached to the legs, making it diffi for him to walk. --Gru sneaks up on a SLEEPING KYLE. He gestures the Minio to come over, carrying a BATHTUB. They place the tub on t ground, and as Gru is about to ambush Kyle, Stuart snaps PHOTO. The flash awakens Kyle and he ATTACKS Gru. Stuart snaps photos of Gru being attacked. --The Minions approach a giant PAINTING of GRU’S MOM. The begin to vandalize it, drawing googly eyes and an afro on image. Gru appears onscreen and considers the vandalized painting for a moment, before drawing a YELLOW MUSTACHE o it. The Minions laugh until Gru’s Mom appears, when they unabashedly BLAME GRU. --The Minions gather around Gru, embracing him in a large GROUP HUG. A pile of Minions fills the screen. Gru’s head pops out of the pile, SMILING HAPPILY. --POST CREDITS: The Minions and other characters from the movie sing a version of The Beatles’ “Revolution.”
